Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1826427136085594112/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Convert references (docx) to Mendeley (BibTeX)"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/copywriting/writing/1826427136085594112/)_"
---
Rewrite the references [PROMPT] [TARGETLANGUAGE] in according of the below steps:
1. Format all reference according to BibTeX rules. A BibTeX reference typically consists of several fields, including author(s), title, journal/book title, year, volume, number, pages, and publisher. Ensure that the formatting matches the BibTeX requirements.
2. Create the source code with new references formmated, the code must be written in the format of a .bib file
